link.title: Caribou & Stockholm - Parents

h2.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;
click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

span.style: top: -11px
font-family: Roboto; font-size: 38px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: Need Wi-Fi at Home? Here are some options

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;
margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: to offer 60 free days of broadband for families during COVID-19 school closures.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

li.p: Free Hot Spots - RSU 39 has a limited number of free HotSpots for Wi-Fi access.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

li.p: Verizon offering additional Mobile Hotspot data for customers-they are automatically adding 15 GB of data across nearly all of their plans, to be used between 03/25/2020 and 04/30/2020. Please note that you will not see the additional allowance in your My Verizon account online, in the Verizon App, or on your bill. To be eligible, you must be on a qualifying postpaid (unlimited or shared), Jetpack or prepaid plan.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

li.p: US Cellular is offering now until the end of May, no matter what plan you're on, be assured that you'll continue to have the smartphone data you need and not be charged for any overages.

p.style: margin-left: 40px; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.p: Eliminated overage charges for those of you on legacy plans, including Shared Connect and other postpaid and prepaid plans with data limits, so you can use the data you need without worrying about your bill.

p.style: margin-left: 40px; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: To further enhance your experience, if you are currently on a limited 2GB or 6GB plan, your plan will not be throttled to 2G speeds at those thresholds.

p.style: margin-left: 40px; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Additionally, extra data provided beyond your plan will be delivered at speeds that are suitable for standard definition video quality.

p.style: margin-left: 40px; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: If you’re on an Unlimited Everyday or Even Better plan, we’ve provided you an extra 15GB of hotspot data to adjust to any shifting and varying work arrangements.

p.style: margin-left: 40px; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: We did this proactively and automatically with your needs in mind, and no action

span.style: font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: is needed from you to receive these enhancements.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Roboto; text-decoration: underline;
text-decoration: underline;
span.a: - Please complete the new comprehensive technology resources-

span.style: font-family: Roboto; text-decoration: underline;

p.style: margin-right: 0; text-align: left;

h2.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

span.style: top: -11px
font-family: Roboto; font-weight: normal;

div.span: IMPORTANT INFORMATION ON FILTERING YOUR HOME NETWORK

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 20px;

div.p: An Internet filtering system is used within the school’s network but is not available for home use.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 20px;

span.style: text-decoration: underline;
span.a: Please visit www.opendns.com for information about how to filter your home Internet

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 20px;

span.style: text-decoration: underline;

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

h2.div: Were you given a Kajeet Hotspot? Here is how to connect to your home wifi.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-c5RTEf purZT-AhqUyc-c5RTEf pSzOP-AhqUyc-c5RTEf jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque
hJDwNd-AhqUyc-c5RTEf purZT-AhqUyc-II5mzb pSzOP-AhqUyc-qWD73c jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-c5RTEf purZT-AhqUyc-c5RTEf pSzOP-AhqUyc-c5RTEf jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque
hJDwNd-AhqUyc-c5RTEf purZT-AhqUyc-II5mzb pSzOP-AhqUyc-qWD73c jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.p: RSU 39 employs a variety of ways for teachers to share content with students online and to provide learning experiences through online platforms. Our school teams will continue to work on continued planning of the online curriculum implementation, as well as how to ensure effective, efficient communication with families. We are excited to be able to provide an educational opportunity that supports students’ 21st century skills and our District goal of supporting innovative, creative, and critical thinkers. This information in this document will help families get started with online learning.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: Daily Expectations of Students and Families:

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 48px;

div.p: ● Check Gmail. Students in grades 6-12 need to check their District Gmail account every day! We encourage families to practice this today, Elementary students do not have a district email, so teachers will communicate directly with parents at these grade levels.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 48px;

span.style: font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: ● Develop a schedule. School is in session, just virtually. Parents and students will receive information from their teachers about when and how classes will be taught, and also about the office hours they’ll hold to provide support.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 48px;

span.style: font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: ● Ensure your student has a device. Do your children have a computer and access to the internet? If not, please fill out this

span.style: text-decoration: normal;
font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: to receive a device. Call the school to let them know you’d like to pick up a device.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: What support will I get from the school district?

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 48px;

span.style: font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: ● Online resources. Students in grades

span.style: font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Roboto;
font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: will be given paper packets, books and supplies to complete work at home during the distance learning days. Students in grades

span.style: font-family: Roboto;
font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: will utilize Google Classroom and their district Gmail accounts to provide a rich online curriculum

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 48px;

span.style: font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: ● Parent support sessions. Virtual parent support will be offered routinely. Video tutorials will be published so that you can access the information at a time that works best for your schedule.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: How does my student access their School Google account?

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 48px;

div.p: ● Use any browser to access Gmail - chrome is preferred.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 48px;

span.style: font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: ● Navigate to Gmail.com and log in using the following information:

p.style: margin-left: 96px; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: ○ The username/email address is

p.style: margin-left: 96px; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;
margin-left: 96px; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 48px;

span.style: font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
text-decoration: underline;
font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;
text-decoration: underline;
font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 96px; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 48px;
margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: If your student has forgotten their email password, please contact your child’s school for help.

span.style: top: -11px
font-family: Roboto; text-decoration: underline;

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-c5RTEf purZT-AhqUyc-c5RTEf pSzOP-AhqUyc-c5RTEf jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc
hJDwNd-AhqUyc-c5RTEf purZT-AhqUyc-c5RTEf pSzOP-AhqUyc-c5RTEf jXK9ad D2fZ2 wHaque GNzUNc

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Each week, we'll do some of the following to

span.style: font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: and

span.style: font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: engaged in how math relates to their real lives:

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: *Math-Rap Battles

span.style: font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

br.span: *And a bunch of other fun, really cool activities that will help kids love math!

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Note: Wacky Math Hour is a live class, and is not recorded.

span.style: font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: You've gotta show up to be a part of it, and we look forward to seeing you!

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-c5RTEf purZT-AhqUyc-c5RTEf pSzOP-AhqUyc-c5RTEf jXK9ad D2fZ2 wHaque GNzUNc

p.style: text-align: center;
